asa241_test
13-Aug-2004 09:41:44

ASA241_PRB:
  Test the routines in ASA241 (MATLAB version).

TEST01:
  Let FX = NormalCDF ( X ).

  NORMAL_CDF_VALUES returns some values of ( X, FX ).

  R_NORMAL_CDF_INVERSE takes the value of FX, and computes
    an estimate X2, of the corresponding input argument,
    accurate to about 7 decimal places.

      X                       FX               X2

  0.0000000000000000e+000  5.0000000000000000e-001  0.0000000000000000e+000
  1.0000000000000001e-001  5.3982783727702899e-001  1.0000000250172568e-001

TEST02:
  Let FX = NormalCDF ( X ).

  NORMAL_CDF_VALUES returns some values of ( X, FX ).

  D_NORMAL_CDF_INVERSE takes the value of FX, and computes an
    estimate X2, of the corresponding input argument,
    accurate to about 16 decimal places.

      X                       FX               X2

  0.0000000000000000e+000  5.0000000000000000e-001  0.0000000000000000e+000
  1.0000000000000001e-001  5.3982783727702899e-001  9.9999999999999992e-002
